title: Italian Unification
summary: Italy was unified under King of &{Sardinia-Piedmont} King Victor Emmanuel II. The unification was completed when the Papal States were annexed in 1870. The unification was only possible because of the work of %{Giuseppe Garibaldi#Giuseppe Garibaldi} and %{Count Cavour#Count Cavour}. With Garibaldi helping by taking over Southern Italy with his &{Red Shirts} and then allowing the King to take over the rest of Italy.
